Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.virtual_model

Class VirtualGameManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.virtual_model.VirtualGameManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote
public class VirtualGameManager extends Object implements Remote, Serializable
The VirtualGameManager class represents a virtual game manager. It provides methods for managing game-related operations.

    • receiveChatMessage

      public void receiveChatMessage(String gameID, String toUser, String fromUser, String message, boolean fullChat, boolean inGame, MyRemoteInterface stub)
      Receives a chat message.
      Parameters:
      gameID - the ID of the game
      toUser - the user to whom the message is sent
      fromUser - the user who sent the message
      message - the chat message
      fullChat - true if it's a full chat message, false otherwise
      inGame - true if the message is in-game, false otherwise
      stub - the remote object stub
